item.title: Yet more fly tipping on Chai Walk, 25th November
item.description:
A washing machine has been fly tipped by residents of Chai Walk. Will the council be doing something to discourage fly tipping, or will they just continue to provide a free bulky waste service for the residents while the rest of us have to pay?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mount Pleasant Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Terrible potholes, 25th November
item.description:
These have been getting worse over the last couple of years. Outside numbers 6,8 & 10 Cotleigh Avenue Bexley It's Very damaging to our vehicles,It's unbelievable that it still hasn't been fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Cotleigh Avenue, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vans parked on double yellows, 25th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanbury Road, Nunhead, Greater London

item.title: Dead cat, 25th November
item.description:
There is a dead cat left by the side of the road that must have been hit by a car within the past few hours. There is no collar or anything to identify the animal's owners.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Road, Shortlands, Greater London

item.title: Homeless man living in underpass in the carpark, 25th November
item.description:
There is a homeless man that has set up camp in this underpass. I feel completely unsafe walking past to and from the carpark as I have heard him make aggressive comments. He also is constantly doing drugs and makes the whole place smell. There is also times where he has friends hanging around there with him too, as you can imagine it's very intimidating walking past, as this is such a closed dark area already. I can only imagine how the elderly or the young kids feel in the area. I can see that this has already been reported and the case has now been closed however nothing has been done about it, he's been there over a month.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wells Way, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad littering problems, 25th November
item.description:
I have seen so much rubbish on Evering Road between Brooke Road and Upper Clapton Road. I do not know if the street cleaners are doing their job properly.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Payment overhrown, 25th November
item.description:

item.title: Outside 20 and 22 Keyes Road, 25th November
item.description:

item.title: Broken streetlight, 25th November

item.title: Fly tipping bags rubbish on pavement near Clevedon Passage, 25th November

item.title: Dead rat in Car Park, 25th November
item.description:
Dead rat found in Slippers Place Car Park opposite the Stanley Arms (below Hickling House). Extremely horrible to see and opportunities for diseases etc. First see 25th November 2025 int he afternoon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slippers Place, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
